thread.title: Visiting Amsterdam in April? Here's What You...
thread.title_full: Visiting Amsterdam in April? Here's What You...

title: Visiting Amsterdam in April? Here's What You...
text:
Amsterdam in March | Amsterdam Travel by Month | Amsterdam in May > 
April is a wonderful month to be in Amsterdam and the Netherlands as a whole, when multi-colored rows of tulips blanket the fields and locals await Queen's Day, the birthday of Queen Beatrix's mother, Juliana. The Dutch come out in droves as the sunny days return, and as dusk falls later and later, there's ever more time to explore. 
April Pros April is the second-driest month after February - but considerably warmer! Seasonal attractions, from theme parks to cafe terraces, re-open Keukenhof, the Netherlands' world-famous tulip park, is open all month 
April Cons Airfare and accommdation fees rise thanks to "tulipmania" and Queen's Day festivities Tourist attractions become more crowded, especially on weekends -- and Queen's Day ushers in the mother of all crowds! 
April Weather Average high: 55째F (12.8째C) Average low: 38째F (3.3째C) Average precipitation: 2.1 in (53 mm) 
Yearly Festivals & Events in April See event web sites for this year's visitor information.
